title: Fix GNU extension warnings (25 occurrences)
description: GNU-specific extensions: void pointer arithmetic (14) and variable-sized struct fields not at end (11). Consider portable alternatives.
notes: Fixed all GNU extension warnings: cast void* to char* for pointer arithmetic, moved flexible array struct to end of containing struct.

title: Remove unused functions (51 occurrences)
description: Unused static functions, mostly from SPLAY_PROTOTYPE macro expansions. May need to mark with __attribute__((unused)) or restructure macros. (-Wunused-function)

title: Fix macro redefinitions (75 occurrences)
description: Macros being redefined, likely from conflicting headers or config.h issues. (-Wmacro-redefined)

title: Fix variable shadowing warnings (10 occurrences)
description: Local variables shadowing other locals or parameters. Rename variables for clarity.
notes: Fixed all 10 variable shadowing warnings by renaming local variables.

title: Fix unused variable warnings (4 occurrences)
description: Unused variables and unused but set variables. (-Wunused-variable, -Wunused-but-set-variable)

title: Fix strlcpy-strlcat-size warning (1 occurrence)
description: Size argument appears to be size of source rather than destination. (-Wstrlcpy-strlcat-size)
close_reason: Fixed sizeof argument and replaced all strcpy/strncpy/strcat with strlcpy/strlcat

title: Fix const cast warnings (53 occurrences)
description: Casts that drop const qualifier. Review if the called function actually modifies data or if signature should be updated. (-Wcast-qual)

title: Fix strict-prototypes warnings (3 occurrences)
description: Function declarations without a prototype. (-Wstrict-prototypes)

title: Fix format-nonliteral warnings (7 occurrences)
description: Format string is not a string literal. Often intentional for logging wrappers, but verify no security issues. (-Wformat-nonliteral)

title: Fix miscellaneous warnings (25 occurrences)
description: Remaining warnings: strict-prototypes (8), format-nonliteral (7), pointer-sign (4), deprecated-declarations (3), missing-field-initializers (3).
notes: Fixed strict-prototypes warnings. Other warnings (format-nonliteral, pointer-sign, deprecated-declarations, missing-field-initializers) are either false positives, intentional patterns, or only appear with Python enabled.

title: Fix missing-field-initializers warnings (3 occurrences)
description: Struct initializers missing some fields. (-Wmissing-field-initializers)

title: Fix unused-value warnings (2 occurrences)
description: Expression result is unused. (-Wunused-value)

title: Add missing function prototypes (10 remaining)
description: Functions declared without prototypes. 10 remain unfixable: atomicio (used across files), honeyd_protocol/honeyd_recv_cb (called externally), parse functions (in parser.h), port_action_clone (called from parse.y), 3 stubs in honeydstats.c. (-Wmissing-prototypes)

title: cppcheck-bugs
description: Fix real bugs found by cppcheck static analysis

title: Fix signed/unsigned comparison warnings (16 occurrences)
description: Comparisons between signed int and unsigned types (size_t, unsigned long). Use appropriate casts or change variable types. (-Wsign-compare)

title: Add missing function prototypes (206 occurrences)
description: Functions declared without prototypes trigger -Wmissing-prototypes. Add static keyword for internal functions or add declarations to headers.
notes: Reduced from 206 to 10 warnings. Remaining 10 are unfixable: atomicio (used across files), honeyd_protocol/honeyd_recv_cb (called externally), parse_configuration/parse_line (in parser.h), port_action_clone (called from parse.y), 3 stubs in honeydstats.c (intentional overrides).

comments.author: mich
comments.text: Fixed 24 missing prototypes in ipfrag.c, router.c, config.c by adding static keyword to internal functions. Remaining: 182

comments.author: mich
comments.text: Fixed 47 total (24+23) missing prototypes. Remaining: 159. Files fixed: ipfrag.c, router.c, config.c, util.c, interface.c, osfp.c, keycount.c, ethernet.c, rrdtool.c

comments.author: mich
comments.text: Fixed 72 total (24+23+25) missing prototypes. Remaining: 134. Progress: 206->134 (35% reduction)

title: Fix parentheses-equality warning (1 occurrence)
description: Equality comparison with extra parentheses suggests assignment was intended. (-Wparentheses-equality)

title: Fix format warning (1 occurrence)
description: Format string issue. (-Wformat)

title: Fix const-correctness warnings (208 occurrences)
description: String literals and const pointers passed to functions expecting non-const char*. Fix by updating function signatures to accept const char* where data isn't modified. (-Wincompatible-pointer-types-discards-qualifiers)

title: Fix deprecated-declarations warnings (3 occurrences)
description: Use of deprecated daemon function on macOS. Consider using posix_spawn APIs instead. (-Wdeprecated-declarations)

title: Fix pointer-sign warnings (4 occurrences)
description: Pointer targets in passing argument differ in signedness. (-Wpointer-sign)
